document_data.name: The Black Cockerel
document_data.mainbody: The '''Black Cockerel''' was an aging [[inn]] located in the city of [[Ordulin]] in the {{YearlinkName|1358}}.
document_data.Inhabitants: Known for its sloped floors, ragged carpets, and dusty tapestries, the Black Cockerel was a huge establishment that offered great accommodations to anyone with the coin to pay.
